item.title: Bill Nighy, Imelda Staunton, Dominic West Star in Pablo Trapero’s English-Language Feature Debut, ‘& Sons’
item.description: For Argentina’s Pablo Trapero, best known for his lauded crime drama “The Clan,” directing his first English-language feature film “& Sons,” feels both new and familiar. An adaptation of Dav

item.title: Why Bill Nighy Won’t Watch ‘& Sons’ Ahead of Toronto Fest World Premiere
item.description: Director Pablo Trapero shouldn’t take the English actor’s screen fright personally. “I am committed to never laying eyes on myself performing,” Nighy tells THR.

item.title: Why Bill Nighy Won’t Watch ‘& Sons’ Ahead of Toronto Fest World Premiere
item.description: Director Pablo Trapero shouldn’t take the English actor’s screen fright personally. “I am committed to never laying eyes on myself performing,” Nighy tells THR.

item.title: First Look at ‘Harlan Coben’s Lazarus’ Sees Sam Claflin Probe Father’s Mysterious Death
item.description: Bill Nighy, playing the lead character’s late father, and Alexandra Roach as Claflin’s sister, also star in the Prime Video limited series releasing Oct. 22.
